resources.string:
Unlocks extra features, such as the Shortcuts, Gestures, Edit apps Theme customizations and removes ads. 

The source code of ALauncher is available on GitHub. You are welcome to compile the pro version yourself for free. 

However if you like what I do and love ALauncher and want us to survive, please support the development and receive updates through the App Store, consider purchasing ALauncher Pro. 

Thank you,
Hari
Support the development and receive updates through the app store
If you like ALauncher, leave a positive rating on app store
